caption.p: Effect of clove and caraway essential oils on control of JA tuber decay caused by P. polonicum under storage conditions at 25 Â°C after 2 months. ( A) = untreated control (C), ( B) = untreated and infected by P. polonicum (ARS20), ( C) = treated with caraway oil (CR), ( D) = treated with clove oil (CL), ( E) = treated with caraway oil plus infection by P. polonicum (CRP) and ( F) = treated with clove oil plus infection by P. polonicum (CLP).
